mapper.select: select c.id as id,a.tag_name as tag_name,b.name as style_name,b.preview_image_name as image_name,c.comment as comment from tb_metric_tag a,tb_sfmon_style b,rel_sfmon_metrictag_style c where c.id=#{id} and a.code=c.metric_tag_code and c.style_code=b.code

select c.id as id,a.tag_name as tag_name,b.name style_name,c.editor as editor,c.create_date as create_date,c.comment as comment from tb_metric_tag a,tb_sfmon_style b,rel_sfmon_metrictag_style c where c.style_code=b.code and a.code=c.metric_tag_code order by c.create_date desc
